The WebSphere Cell's security.xml: This file defines the security settings for the entire WAS cell (which IHS often fronts). This critical file is part of the central WAS configuration repository, managed by the Deployment Manager (Dmgr). Its location is typically:

The Web Server Plugin Configuration (plugin-cfg.xml): This XML file is often located on the IHS server (or accessible to it). It tells the IHS web server plugin how to communicate with the WAS application servers, including details about secure transport (SSL). Its location can vary but is often found:

So, to summarize:

<Dmgr_profile_root>/config/cells/<your_cell_name>/security.xml

On a Windows system (if Dmgr is on Windows): C:\IBM\WebSphere\AppServer\profiles\Dmgr01\config\cells\WAS-AP-A01Cell01\security.xml (Drive/path may vary)
This file is central and resides with the Dmgr profile, not typically directly within the IHS server's directory structure.

security.xml: Central WAS security config. Lives with the Deployment Manager profile (Dmgr01).
plugin-cfg.xml: Configures the connection from IHS to WAS. Often found within the IHS structure or the associated WAS node config.
